Package org.jtrim2.property

Interface ValueConverter<InputType,OutputType>

Type Parameters:
InputType - the type of the object to be converted
OutputType - the type of the resulting object
public interface ValueConverter<InputType,OutputType>
Defines an arbitrary conversion from one value to another.

Thread safety

Instances of this interface are required to be completely thread-safe without any further synchronization.

Synchronization transparency

Methods of this interface are required to be synchronization transparent and may be called from any context.
See Also:
  • PropertyFactory.convert(PropertySource, ValueConverter)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    OutputType
    convert(InputType input)
    Converts the input to the appropriate value defined by this conversion.

  • Method Details

    • convert

      OutputType convert(InputType input)
      Converts the input to the appropriate value defined by this conversion.
      Parameters:
      input - the input object of the conversion. This argument can be null if the implementation supports converting null value.
      Returns:
      the result of the conversion. Depending on the implementation, this method may or may not return null.
